reviewText: I have shown this video many times to my students in over 20 schools.

La Misma Luna is an excellent story.  It protrays the reality of life with migrants.  Any immigrant can identify with this story.  It made me cry and laugh.  I showed this video to my students and some of them said that they can look at it again and again because it shows the extent people go to, for a better life.

I want to thank the writer for presenting a true life scenario.

I bought this version specifically because it said it had Spanish subtitles (I'm learning Spanish). It does not. I tried playing it with several different programs and none of them detected Spanish subtitles. I ended up selling it back to Amazon. Not happy about this at all. If you were looking at this because it claims to have Spanish subtitles (why else would you be looking at it instead of the cheaper more popular version that's on Amazon) then you can stop right here and don't waste your money.
